page.title: 01CENTRAL LINCOLN.
page.content: Our area contains a wide variety of different types of land cover.In the south east there is the exclusive village of{Canwick}surrounded by farm land.{South Common}also covers much of the southern portion (used for golf, grazing and general public recreation) Much of our area is{ residential} with its Victorian and Edwardian{terraced houses. Lincoln's shrinking number of of factories are located close to the railways in the centre of our square. North of the{River Witham,}which cuts across the city, is the shopping and commercial centre. Here you will find much of Lincoln's past-{Roman gateways {the Norman castle,Medieval houses}and, overshadowing everything,the{Cathedral The ground rises steeply from the city centre to historic{'uphill'}Lincoln. {Some }of the newer buildings blend successfully with the old.
